00081 #define VALGRIND_MAKE_NOACCESS(x,y)

00083 #define VALGRIND_MAKE_READABLE(x,y)
00084 #define VALGRIND_DISCARD(x)

00086 
00087 /* Cast away qualifiers while avoiding a gcc -Wcast-qual warning; TYPE must be
00088    "T *" and VALUE must have type "qualifier T *".
00089 
00090    The subtraction is there to ensure this type relation; it is wrapped in
00091    sizeof to avoid evaluating VALUE twice - or even evaluating the subtraction,
00092    which has undefined value (assuming TYPE is not a variably-modified
00093    type). */
00094 #define CAST_QUAL(TYPE, VALUE) \
00095   ((void)sizeof ((VALUE) - (TYPE)0), (TYPE)(intptr_t)(VALUE))
00096 
00097 #endif /* !__KERNEL__ */

00112 # endif /* GNUC >= 2.96 */
